name: Idle Koi Fish - Zen Pond
description:
Welcome to the most relaxing zen like idle game : discover, collect and hatch beautiful koi fish to populate your pond !

* 20+ Koi Fish to breed Unlock
* Hundreds of levels to upgrade
*Relaxing stress free sound

Experience the most exciting Koi Fish idle game ! Are you ready to manage your pond and breed all the koi fish ?

Install now and relax in this chill and cute mobile/idle game !!!
